textAfterTable: Shop Green! Produced in the Tamil Nadu region of India, our purchase of these shirts helped employ and care for 120 women who are either handicapped or economically disadvantaged. Additionally, the collective supports 300 small local farmers in the Maharastra area who supply them with cotton. Each garment is lovingly produced from seed to sewing machine. Good for the environment -- good for you! For bulk pricing on these and other items, please contact our Customer Service department at customerservice@greatergood.com.
